entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2 except 6 over southern sections.
